name: white-flute
effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
short_effect: Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A glass flute that
lures wild POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A glass flute that
lures wild POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A white glass flute.
When blown, it makes wild POKéMON
more likely to appear.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A white flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon more
likely to appear.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A white flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon more
likely to appear.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A white flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon more
likely to appear.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A toy flute made from white glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A toy flute made from white glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A lovely toy flute to admire.
It’s made from white glass.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A flute made from white glass. It makes it easier to
encounter weak Pokémon in the place you use it.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A flute made from white glass. It makes it easier to
encounter weak Pokémon in the place you use it.

A flute made from white glass. It makes it easier to
encounter weak Pokémon in the place you use it.

A flute made from white glass. It makes it easier to
encounter weak Pokémon in the place you use it.
